name: places/ChIJE94oRqFYwokRADQnvmgBiog
formattedAddress: 1100 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1100 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text:
My experience with Dr. Maman was fantastic.
First and foremost, he is an exceptionally skilled plastic surgeon. He is precise, meticulous, and thoughtful.
Dr. Maman has a kind and professional approach that immediately put me at ease from the start. He patiently addressed my questions and concerns and walked me through the entire process.
The care that I received from Dr. Maman and the rest of his office personnel was exceptional. It's not often that you come across a physician that exceeds in both their professional knowledge and the ability to provide compassionate care for their patients.

originalText.text:
There are no words to express how thankful I am to have undergone surgery with Dr Maman. I had booked a consultation with him based on his reputation and travelled out of country to meet with him. After leaving his office following the initial visit, I knew that I would not only be in the hands of an expert and talented surgeon, but a great and caring person. I was so calm on the day of the actual surgery because I had complete trust in him and knew that I had chosen the most skilled, meticulous, considerate doctor. Not only did he deliver on his promise to attain my desired results (that he took the time to extensively discuss with me by answering all my questions in depth and with compassion), he also gave me one of the biggest gifts; trust in my surgeon. And for that, I will always be tremendously grateful.

My results are beyond all my expectations. On top of his exceptional aesthetic eye and skills, the before and after care that Dr Maman offers alongside his staff is so remarkable and unique. I can truly say that I would recommend Dr Maman to any family, friend and stranger. If only everyone could be so lucky to have Dr Maman as their surgeon.

originalText.text:
I visited Dr. Maman for what ended up being the best surgical/medical experience ever. My results/surgery significantly improved my quality of life. From the first consult he was direct, honest and generous with his time as we worked together to create a plan with the goal of optimizing the surgery's intended results. I would go so far as to say he under promised and way over delivered. The results are remarkable. His stellar reviews speak volumes, and I share with the other patients in how much I respect and value him as a Dr.

His practice is staffed with warm, friendly professionals who make themselves available, day or night. I have a second surgery scheduled with him, which I elected to do after this first life-changing surgery.

Also, he is a nice person that is easy to talk to and has a sense of humor which makes the overall process enjoyable.

originalText.text: I can’t thank Dr. Maman enough. He is straightforward and extremely nice. He made me feel comfortable from the start. I’m so grateful I used him as my Dr.

originalText.text:
Dr. Maman is undoubtedly the best surgeon for natural results and a safe procedure. I researched other surgeons in NYC prior, but what made Dr. Maman stand out was the natural results and more personalized experience than other surgeons who felt like they were more concerned about taking cameras in the operating room for Instagram and quantity of patients, than quality of care. It was important that I did not feel like my surgeon was rushed or overwhelmed. My results have given me a
Dr. Maman is undoubtedly the best surgeon for natural results and a safe procedure. I researched other surgeons in NYC prior, but what made Dr. Maman stand out was the natural results and more personalized experience than other surgeons who felt like they were more concerned about taking cameras in the operating room for Instagram and quantity of patients, than quality of care. It was important that I did not feel like my surgeon was rushed or overwhelmed. My results have given me an extra boost of confidence and in my specific case, the results were scar-less. His amazing staff, John, Erin, Selena, and nurse, Sam are also pleasant and attentive. I highly recommend Dr. Maman.

Dr. Maman is undoubtedly the best surgeon for natural results and a safe procedure. I researched other surgeons in NYC prior, but what made Dr. Maman stand out was the natural results and more personalized experience than other surgeons who felt like they were more concerned about taking cameras in the operating room for Instagram and quantity of patients, than quality of care. It was important that I did not feel like my surgeon was rushed or overwhelmed. My results have given me an extra boost of confidence and in my specific case, the results were scar-less. His amazing staff, John, Erin, Selena, and nurse, Sam are also pleasant and attentive. I highly recommend Dr. Maman.
